summary.overview: This JCL performs transaction master file backup and recreation operations for the CARDDEMO application. It creates a backup copy of the transaction VSAM file, deletes existing VSAM structures, and redefines a new empty VSAM cluster for transaction processing.
business_functions: Create backup copy of card transaction master file to generation dataset for data protection
Delete existing transaction VSAM cluster and alternate index to clean up current structure
Define new empty VSAM cluster with indexed access for card transaction data storage

TRANBKP.jcl.program_overview: IBM utility for VSAM dataset management operations including backup, delete, and cluster definition

datasource_summary.name: Card Demo Transaction Master File (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.TRANSACT.VSAM.KSDS)
datasource_summary.function: Primary transaction data storage containing card transaction records. Used as source for backup operations and then refreshed with clean structure.

datasource_summary.name: Card Demo Transaction Backup Archive (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.TRANSACT.BKUP(+1))
datasource_summary.function: Backup archive for transaction data. Creates new generation of backup dataset for permanent retention and recovery purposes.

datasource_summary.name: Card Demo Transaction Alternate Index (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.TRANSACT.VSAM.AIX)
datasource_summary.function: Alternate index providing additional access path to transaction records. Removed during file refresh process.

datasource_summary.name: Card Demo Transaction Data Component (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.TRANSACT.VSAM.KSDS.DATA)
datasource_summary.function: Data component of the VSAM cluster containing actual transaction records. Created as part of file refresh process with clean structure.

datasource_summary.name: Card Demo Transaction Index Component (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.TRANSACT.VSAM.KSDS.INDEX)
datasource_summary.function: Index component of the VSAM cluster providing indexed access to transaction records. Created as part of file refresh process.

flow_diagram_code:
flowchart TD
    IDCAMS["IBM utility for VSAM dataset management operations including backup, delete, and cluster definition (IDCAMS) "]
